name: Answer Governance
description: AGOV (ANSWER Governance) is a DAO governance token in the ClubRare Universe (https://universe.clubrare.xyz/) which represents the ClubRare ecosystem. AGOV DAO token holders determine the main operating policies of ClubRare Universe community through voting, manage Treasury via multi-signature, and many more. AGOV DAO token also can be used on the ClubRare Universe platforms: ClubRare Online (https://clubrare.xyz/) (NFT marketplace, Beta), ClubRare Shopping Metaverse (https://metaverse-prototype.clubrare.xyz/) (Prototype). AGOV DAO token grows in value with the growth of ClubRare Universe products: • ClubRare Online (https://clubrare.xyz/) - marketplace for digital & physical NFTs (Beta) • MPWR utility token (https://universe.clubrare.xyz/mpwr) • ClubRare DeFi (https://farm.clubrare.xyz/) • Lazy Leo Club (https://www.lazyleoclub.xyz/) - NFT which gives you benefits in the ClubRare Universe and in outside of it • ClubRare Shopping Metaverse (https://metaverse-prototype.clubrare.xyz/) (Prototype) ClubRare Universe is a global team consisting of global members. ClubRare is a platinum sponsor of NFT.NYC2022 (https://www.nft.nyc/) conference. You can buy AGOV at Uniswap: https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?chain=mainnet&outputCurrency=0xd1420AF453Fd7bf940573431D416cAcE7fF8280c AGOV-ETH pair on Uniswap: https://info.uniswap.org/#/pools/0x6f5ad69406f6f11f61cd6a6b8e7178fe0b8e5bb9
